title: Client crash after login
body: Every time I login my client freezes after a few seconds and a message pops up saying the client has stopped working, any fix for this? Haven't tried reinstalling.

replies.body:
Most of the time that this happens, it's caused by your client dropping its connection from the Maestro or PvP.net service platform. The most common cause is that some local network configurations are preventing a stable connection from being established. To combat this, I suggest taking a look at the common solutions outlined in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if this issue persists.
Running the hextech repair tool solved it for me
